title: Latest News from Science Magazine
description: Keyword search result for Alerts: News Weekly Headlines -- New results matching your keyword search query (updated daily).

items.title: Missing wind from Milky Way’s giant black hole finally found
items.description: Astronomers may have glimpsed a long-predicted wind of gas blowing out from Sagittarius A*

items.title: Well-exercised male mice appear to pass fitness to their male offspring
items.description: Surprising epigenetic effect relies on snippets of RNA packaged within sperm

items.title: Quantum effects in electrical circuits honored with Physics Nobel
items.description: Breakthrough paved the way to many of today’s budding quantum computers

items.title: Big U.S. West Coast earthquakes could come as a one-two punch
items.description: Cascadia and San Andreas fault zones appear to generate synchronized earthquakes

items.title: Medicine Nobel goes to three researchers who identified immune system’s security guards
items.description: Mary Brunkow, Fred Ramsdell, and Shimon Sakaguchi revealed how regulatory T cells prevent autoimmune disease

items.title: Science teachers scramble as U.S. climate resources vanish
items.description: As government websites go dark, some nonprofits are trying to fill the void

items.title: Fate of the last female great auk is finally solved
items.description: DNA and historical sleuthing have traced the extinct bird’s remains to a museum in Ohio

items.title: Jane Goodall, famed primatologist, changed the way we thought about apes
items.description: The scientist and conservationist made waves with her observations and advocacy

items.title: Climate research organization cuts dozens of jobs
items.description: Coalition that runs premier climate modeling center faces rising costs and budget uncertainty

items.title: New radioactive isotope therapies promise more targeted attacks on cancer
items.description: Recent clinical successes, and profits, have prompted a rush among pharma companies to try new isotopes and targeting strategies
